channel.title: Dealingwithachange on Becoming a better Tester!
channel.description: Recent content in Dealingwithachange on Becoming a better Tester!

item.title: Dealing with changes in requirements!
item.description: This happens to everyone irrespective of the SDLC phase - mostly in the late development phase for business/customer’s benefit… General scenarios when one ends up in this situation : You are in the middle of validating a User Story, you find some gaps considering User’s behaviour for the functionality which are leading to bugs, you check with BA/PO and they change the requirement. OR You just signed off the story. It’s about to be released as an update.
